com.boxysystems.jgoogleanalytics
Class JGoogleAnalyticsTracker

public class JGoogleAnalyticsTracker
extends java.lang.Object

Main class for tracking google analytics data.

Version:
: 0.1
Author:
: Siddique Hameed
See Also:
: http://JGoogleAnalytics.googlecode.com

setLoggingAdapter

public void setLoggingAdapter(LoggingAdapter loggingAdapter)
Setter injection for LoggingAdpater. You can hook up log4j, System.out or any other loggers you want.

Parameters:
loggingAdapter - implemented instance of LoggingAdapter

trackSynchronously

public void trackSynchronously(FocusPoint focusPoint)
Track the focusPoint in the application synchronously.
Please be cognizant while using this method. Since, it would have a peformance hit on the actual application. Use it unless it's really needed

Parameters:
focusPoint - Focus point of the application like application load, application module load, user actions, error events etc.

trackAsynchronously

public void trackAsynchronously(FocusPoint focusPoint)
Track the focusPoint in the application asynchronously.

Parameters:
focusPoint - Focus point of the application like application load, application module load, user actions, error events etc.
